applicant-name.name: SUZHOU XIMEIKE THERMAL CONDUCTION TECH CO LTD
苏州矽美科导热科技有限公司

invention-title: Heat-conducting gel with low oil permeability and high heat conductivity and preparation method thereof
一种低渗油高导热的导热凝胶及制备方法

abstract.p: The invention relates to the field of heat-conducting gel, and discloses low-oil-permeability and high-heat-conductivity heat-conducting gel which is prepared from the following raw materials in percentage by mass: 3-22% of silicone oil, 0.05-0.5% of white carbon black, 0.1-2% of a coupling agent, 0.5-1% of diatomite, 0.1-1% of a catalyst, 2-15% of acrylate, 2-20% of organopolysiloxane and the balance of inorganic heat-conducting filler. The organopolysiloxane comprises organopolysiloxane containing a vinyl group and organopolysiloxane containing a hydrogen group; the acrylic ester comprises butyl acrylate and methyl methacrylate; according to the heat-conducting gel, the diatomite and the white carbon black with adsorbability are added, so that the oil yield of the heat-conducting gel can be remarkably reduced, meanwhile, the acrylic ester is added to coat the outer surface of the inorganic heat-conducting filler, the purpose of enhancing the strength and the toughness of the heat-conducting gel is achieved, and the heat-conducting gel forms a steady-state heat-conducting fluid through the organopolysiloxane, so that the heat-conducting gel has a good heat-conducting effect. The coating has the advantages of high thermal conductivity, low permeability, good heat resistance, low viscosity, stable performance, long-term storage and the like.

本发明涉及导热凝胶领域，且公开了一种低渗油高导热的导热凝胶，由包括以下质量百分比的原料制成：硅油3‑22％、白炭黑0.05‑0.5％、偶联剂0.1‑2％、硅藻土0.5‑1％、催化剂0.1‑1％、丙烯酸酯2‑15％和有机聚硅氧烷2‑20％，余量为无机导热填料；有机聚硅氧烷包括含乙烯基有机聚硅氧烷和含氢基有机聚硅氧烷；丙烯酸酯包括丙烯酸丁酯和甲基丙烯酸甲酯；该导热凝胶通过加入有具有吸附性的硅藻土和白炭黑，可显著降低导热凝胶的出油率，同时通过加入丙烯酸酯包覆在无机导热填料外表面，达到增强导热凝胶强度与韧性的目，并通过有机聚硅氧烷使得该导热凝胶形成稳态的导热流体，具有导热性高、渗透率低、耐热性好、粘度低、性能稳定可长期储存等优点。
